titlestmt.titleproper: Records Relating to Social Fundamentals, an Orientation Course Required for all Freshman Women 1934-1949
Records Relating to Social Fundamentals, an Orientation Course Required for all Freshman Women

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Records Relating to Social Fundamentals, an Orientation Course Required for all Freshman Women 1934-1949

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: University of Arizona. Office of the Dean of Women.

did.abstract: Includes lecture schedules, examination questions, correspondence, historical notes and related items of a course given from 1931 to 1951, covering social etiquette and relationships, health, nutrition, clothing selection, attitudes, values and vocational options. The course was taught originally by members of the Dean's Office, and the Dept. of Home Economics and Physical Education. Evelyn J. Kirmse was Dean, 1929-1947.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.p: Records Relating to Social Fundamentals, an Orientation Course Required for all Freshman Women (AZ 519). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The course was taught originally by members of the Dean's Office, and the Dept. of Home Economics and Physical Education. Evelyn J. Kirmse was Dean, 1929-1947.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Includes lecture schedules, examination questions, correspondence, historical notes and related items of a course given from 1931 to 1951, covering social etiquette and relationships, health, nutrition, clothing selection, attitudes, values and vocational options.
